title: Section is a content container to enclose any type of content.

sections.heading: Theming
sections.body: A section can be stylized in a variety of ways. You can vary the fill color of a section by using the fillColor property. Outline of the section can be changed using outlineColor. Color of the text can be changed using textColor property. Color related properties support any oakui color theme.

sections.heading: Semi transparent mode
sections.body: To achieve semi transparent fill color, set the semitransparent boolean attribute to true. Semi transparency is supported for all fill color schemes.

sections.heading: Contrast
sections.body: Contrast between background and foreground is always taken care, when you choose the textColor as auto. For all other textColor values, you should consider the color combinations wisely.
